abTestPage.text: Also known as split testing. This is a way in which businesses are able to simultaneously test and learn different versions of a page to see which text and/or functionality works best towards a desired outcome (e.g. a user action such as a click-through).

abTesPage.text: Also known as split testing. This is a way in which businesses are able to simultaneously test and learn different versions of a page to see which text and/or functionality works best towards a desired outcome (e.g. a user action such as a click-through).
